1. to fill; full; filled; packed; fully; completely; quite; to reach the limit; to satisfy; satisfied; contented
2. mite
3. the youngest
mǎn /man3/
mǎnle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to fill; full; filled; packed; fully; completely; quite; to reach the limit; to satisfy; satisfied; contented
2. mite
3. the youngest

mǎng /mang3/

mǎo /mao3/
1. mortise (slot cut into wood to receive a tenon); 4th earthly branch: 5-7 a.m., 2nd solar month (6th March-4th April), Year of the Rabbit; ancient Chinese compass point: 90° (east); (coll.) to concentrate one's strength
2. the Pleiades
3. to not have (Cantonese) (Mandarin equivalent: »méiyǒu«)
4. to fasten with a rivet; to rivet; to hammer in a rivet; (coll.) to concentrate one's strength
5. round yellow dirt mount (in the Northwest of China)
6. still water
7. type of water plant; (dialect) loess hills
mǎo /mao3/
mǎozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

mào /mao4/
1. to emit; to give off; to send out (or up, forth)
2. to brave; to face
3. (bound form) reckless
4. to falsely adopt (sb's identity etc); to feign
5. (literary) to cover
6. (bound form) appearance; looks; outward form
7. luxuriant; (chemistry) cyclopentadiene
8. commerce; trade
9. hat; cap
10. envious
11. to be hardworking; luxuriant; splendid
12. Cydonia japonica
13. restless
14. (jade)
15. having poor eyesight
16. indistinct vision; dim
17. extremely aged (in one's 80s or 90s); octogenarian; nonagenarian
18. select; vegetables
19. length; distance from north to south
20. ancient place name

méi /mei2/
1. (negative prefix for verbs) have not; not
2. classifier for small objects: coins, badges, rings, carved seals, chess pieces, eggs, fingerprints etc (more formal than »gè«); classifier for bombs, missiles, satellites etc; (on product packaging) classifier for flat items (from Japanese "mai"); (old) stick used as a gag to prevent soldiers from talking while sneaking up on the enemy
3. eyebrow; upper margin
4. berry; strawberry
5. plum; plum flower; Japanese apricot (Prunus mume)
6. mold; mildew; to become moldy
7. medium; intermediary; matchmaker; go-between; abbr. for »méitǐ«, media, esp. news media
8. enzyme; ferment
9. coal; CL: kuài
10. millet
11. lintel; crossbeam
12. (fine jade); used in »méiguī«
13. (literary) shore; coast; bank
14. americium (chemistry)
15. strawberry
16. plum
17. low wall
18. (used in personal names)
19. used for ferret, badger or mongoose
20. (stone which resembles jade)
21. heir-requesting sacrifice
22. meat on the back of an animal
23. quickening of the fetus
24. ancient place name
25. americium (chemistry) (Tw); (archaic) metal chain
26. babbler (bird)
méi /mei2/
méizhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

2. classifier for small objects: coins, badges, rings, carved seals, chess pieces, eggs, fingerprints etc (more formal than »gè«); classifier for bombs, missiles, satellites etc; (on product packaging) classifier for flat items (from Japanese "mai"); (old) stick used as a gag to prevent soldiers from talking while sneaking up on the enemy

méi /mei2/
méiguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

méng /meng2/
1. (literary) sincere; honest; genuine
2. drizzle; mist
3. blind; dim-sighted
4. to cover; ignorant; to suffer (misfortune); to receive (a favor); to cheat
5. oath; pledge; union; to ally; league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia
6. (bound form) to sprout; to bud
7. (coll.) cute; adorable (orthographic borrowing from Japanese え "moe", affection for an anime or manga character)
8. twilight before dawn
9. (literary) common people
10. rafters supporting tiles; ridge of a roof
11. eyesight obscured; to feel ashamed
12. (mineral)
13. Fritillaria verticillata
14. horsefly; gadfly
15. tropic bird

13. a grass that gives red dye

2. generic term for cotton or kapok; cotton; padded or quilted with cotton
3. silk floss; continuous; soft; weak; mild-mannered (dialect)
4. cotton
5. large, black cicada; locust
mián /mian2/
miánzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to sleep; to hibernate
2. generic term for cotton or kapok; cotton; padded or quilted with cotton
3. silk floss; continuous; soft; weak; mild-mannered (dialect)
4. cotton
5. large, black cicada; locust

miǎo /miao3/
1. second (unit of time); arc second (angular measurement unit); (coll.) instantly
2. (of an expanse of water) vast; distant and indistinct; tiny or insignificant
3. the limit; tip of branch
4. to despise; small
5. a flood; infinity
6. blind in one eye; blind; tiny; humble; to stare
7. profound; remote
miǎo /miao3/
miǎozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. second (unit of time); arc second (angular measurement unit); (coll.) instantly
2. (of an expanse of water) vast; distant and indistinct; tiny or insignificant
3. the limit; tip of branch
4. to despise; small
5. a flood; infinity
6. blind in one eye; blind; tiny; humble; to stare
7. profound; remote
miǎo /miao3/
miǎoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. second (unit of time); arc second (angular measurement unit); (coll.) instantly
2. (of an expanse of water) vast; distant and indistinct; tiny or insignificant
3. the limit; tip of branch
4. to despise; small
5. a flood; infinity
6. blind in one eye; blind; tiny; humble; to stare
7. profound; remote
miǎo /miao3/

mie /mie5/
■ phonetic "myeo" used in place names (Korean gugja)
miē /mie1/
1. the bleating of sheep; final particle which transforms statements into questions that indicate doubt or surprise (Cantonese)
2. used in »miēxie«; (Cantonese) what?
3. to carry on the back or shoulders (Cantonese)
miē /mie1/

miè /mie4/
1. to extinguish or put out; to go out (of a fire etc); to exterminate or wipe out; to drown
2. to belittle; nothing
3. defiled with blood
4. the outer layer of a stalk of bamboo (or reed or sorghum); a thin bamboo strip
5. carriage cover
6. (literary) to pull out; to remove; (literary) to massage
7. minute flies

míng /ming2/
1. name; noun (part of speech); place (e.g. among winners); famous; classifier for people
2. bright; opposite: dark »àn«; (of meaning) clear; to understand; next; public or open; wise; generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
3. dark; deep; stupid; the underworld
4. to cry (of birds, animals and insects); to make a sound; to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
5. to engrave; inscribed motto
6. dark
7. Thea sinensis; young leaves of tea
8. name of a river
9. to drizzle; sea
10. space between the eyebrows and the eyelashes
11. to close (the eyes)
12. lucky place
13. boring insect; snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
14. place name

mǒ /mo3/
1. to smear; to wipe; to erase; classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
2. (Japanese kokuji) I, me (archaic); suffix attached to the name of a person or pet; pr. maro
mǒ /mo3/
mǒzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to smear; to wipe; to erase; classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
2. (Japanese kokuji) I, me (archaic); suffix attached to the name of a person or pet; pr. maro
mǒ /mo3/
mǒguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to smear; to wipe; to erase; classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
2. (Japanese kokuji) I, me (archaic); suffix attached to the name of a person or pet; pr. maro
mǒ /mo3/
mǒle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to smear; to wipe; to erase; classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
2. (Japanese kokuji) I, me (archaic); suffix attached to the name of a person or pet; pr. maro

náo /nao2/
1. to scratch; to thwart; to yield
2. (literary) to disturb; (literary) to weaken
3. clamor; (onom.) "look!"
4. a kind of gibbon (old variant of »náo«)
5. name of a mountain
6. (literary) a kind of gibbon; (music) wide vibrato (technique for playing the guqin »gǔqín«) (cf. »yín«, rapid vibrato)
7. parasitic worm; human pinworm (Enterobius vermicularis)
8. wrangling, contention, to dispute
9. big cymbals
náo /nao2/
náozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to scratch; to thwart; to yield
2. (literary) to disturb; (literary) to weaken
3. clamor; (onom.) "look!"
4. a kind of gibbon (old variant of »náo«)
5. name of a mountain
6. (literary) a kind of gibbon; (music) wide vibrato (technique for playing the guqin »gǔqín«) (cf. »yín«, rapid vibrato)
7. parasitic worm; human pinworm (Enterobius vermicularis)
8. wrangling, contention, to dispute
9. big cymbals
náo /nao2/
náoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to scratch; to thwart; to yield
2. (literary) to disturb; (literary) to weaken
3. clamor; (onom.) "look!"
4. a kind of gibbon (old variant of »náo«)
5. name of a mountain
6. (literary) a kind of gibbon; (music) wide vibrato (technique for playing the guqin »gǔqín«) (cf. »yín«, rapid vibrato)
7. parasitic worm; human pinworm (Enterobius vermicularis)
8. wrangling, contention, to dispute
9. big cymbals
náo /nao2/
náole, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to scratch; to thwart; to yield
2. (literary) to disturb; (literary) to weaken
3. clamor; (onom.) "look!"
4. a kind of gibbon (old variant of »náo«)
5. name of a mountain
6. (literary) a kind of gibbon; (music) wide vibrato (technique for playing the guqin »gǔqín«) (cf. »yín«, rapid vibrato)
7. parasitic worm; human pinworm (Enterobius vermicularis)
8. wrangling, contention, to dispute
9. big cymbals

nà /na4/
1. (specifier) that; the; those (colloquial pr. »nèi«)
2. (pronoun) that (referring to persons, things or situations)
3. then (in that case)
4. battle cry
5. to receive; to accept; to enjoy; to bring into; to pay (tax etc); nano- (one billionth); to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
6. sodium (chemistry)
7. (phonetic na); used esp. in female names such as Anna »Ānnà« or Diana »Dàiānnà«
8. to press down firmly; to suppress; right-falling stroke in Chinese characters (e.g. the last stroke of »dà«)
9. cassock; to line
10. inner reins of a 4-horse team

■ particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?"); particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?"); particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?"); (at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action; particle indicating strong affirmation

nèn /nen4/
1. young and tender
2. (of food) tender; lightly cooked
3. (of color) light
4. (of a person) inexperienced; unskilled
5. to think; this; which?; how? (literary); Taiwan pr. »rèn«

niǎn /nian3/

2. to expel; to oust; (dialect) to chase after; to try to catch up with
3. to twirl (in the fingers)
4. (archaic) man-drawn carriage; an imperial carriage; to transport by carriage
5. to play tricks on or toy with; delicate; exquisite (Cantonese)
6. muddy water
7. calm water

■ weary; tired
niè /nie4/
1. (literary) alunite (formerly used as a black dye); (literary) to dye black
2. son born of a concubine; disaster; sin; evil
3. bones of the temple (on the human head); see , temple
4. to gnaw; to erode
5. to gnaw
6. nickel (chemistry)
7. to whisper
8. to walk on tiptoe; to walk quietly; to tread (on); to follow
9. new shoot growing from cut branch or stump
10. (bound form) tweezers; to use tweezers (to grasp, pick up, or pull out etc, depending on whether the following resultative verb is »zhù« or »qǐ« or »chū« etc)
11. talkative
12. move the mouth as in speaking
13. to seize with the hand; to grasp; to advance; to breakdown
14. to fill up or cover up a hole
15. (literary) yeast used for brewing wine
16. guidepost; rule; standard; limit; target (old)
17. tottering; unsteady
18. (old) to talk a lot; to talk nonsense; also pr. »zhé«
19. vertical divider of a door way
20. dangerous

Ní Tuòshēng /Ni2 Tuo4 sheng1/*
■ Ni Tuosheng or Watchman Nee (1903-1972), influential Chinese Christian
nǐ /ni3/
1. you (informal, as opposed to courteous »nín«)
2. you (Note: In Taiwan, is used to address females, but in mainland China, it is not commonly used. Instead, is used to address both males and females.)
3. doubtful; suspicious; to emulate; to imitate
4. to plan to; to draft (a plan); to imitate; to assess; to compare; pseudo-
5. you (used to address a deity)
6. (tree); to stop
7. luxuriant (of plants)
8. nihonium (chemistry)
nǐ /ni3/
nǐzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. you (informal, as opposed to courteous »nín«)
2. you (Note: In Taiwan, is used to address females, but in mainland China, it is not commonly used. Instead, is used to address both males and females.)
3. doubtful; suspicious; to emulate; to imitate
4. to plan to; to draft (a plan); to imitate; to assess; to compare; pseudo-
5. you (used to address a deity)
6. (tree); to stop
7. luxuriant (of plants)
8. nihonium (chemistry)
nǐ /ni3/
nǐguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

2. you (Note: In Taiwan, is used to address females, but in mainland China, it is not commonly used. Instead, is used to address both males and females.)

4. to plan to; to draft (a plan); to imitate; to assess; to compare; pseudo-

nǐ /ni3/
nǐle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

nóngyèqū /nong2 ye4 qu1/*
■ agricultural region
nóngyèshēngjì /nong2 ye4 sheng1 ji4/*
■ agri-biotechnology
nóngyètīng /nong2ye4ting1/
■ (provincial) department of agriculture
nóngyèxiàndàihuà /nong2 ye4 xian4 dai4 hua4/*
■ modernization of agriculture, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations
nóngyì /nong2 yi4/*
■ agronomy
nóngyǒu /nong2 you3/*
■ our peasant friends (political term used in the early years of the Old Democratic Revolution, 1840-1919); (Tw) (coll.) farmer
nóngyuán /nong2 yuan2/*
■ plantation
nóngyù /nong2 yu4/*
■ rich; strong; heavy (fragrance); dense; full-bodied; intense
nóngyùn /nong2 yun4/*
■ peasant movement (abbr. for »nóngmínyùndòng«)

■ China National Farmers' Games (sports meeting for peasants held every 4 years since 1988)
nóngzhǒng /nong2 zhong3/*
■ abscess

nòng /nong4/
■ to do; to manage; to handle; to play with; to fool with; to mess with; to fix; to toy with
nòng /nong4/
nòngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

nòng /nong4/
nòngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

o /o5/
1. sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy; may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
2. (Tw) (sentence-final particle) (used to convey a friendly tone when giving an admonition or correcting sb etc)
ō /o1/
1. oh; ah (used to indicate realization); also pr. »òu«
2. (interjection) oh; I see (used to indicate realization, understanding)
ōmǎigā /o1mai3ga1/
■ (loanword) oh my God!
ōu /ou1/
1. (used for transliteration)
2. to beat up; to hit sb
3. common gull
4. to sing; ballad; folk song
5. bubble; froth
6. (pottery) bowl or drinking vessel
7. severe drought; exceptionally hot weather
ōu /ou1/
ōuzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

2. to beat up; to hit sb
3. common gull

pán /pan2/
1. tray; plate; dish
2. (finance) (bound form) market prices
3. (computing) (bound form) disk
4. to coil (a rope, pigtail etc)
5. to check; to examine; to investigate
6. to transfer; to sell (property)
7. to shift; to move (sth big and heavy)
8. classifier for things resembling a plate or dish
9. classifier for coils
10. classifier for games or matches (chess, table tennis etc)
11. healthy; at ease
12. firm; stable; rock
13. wooden tray
14. to coil
15. classifier for strips of land or bamboo, shops, factories etc; slit bamboo or chopped wood (dialect)
16. to move
17. large scarf
18. plate
19. to wade through water or mud
20. name of a river in Shaanxi
21. small bag; sack
22. large belt

Pán'ānxiàn /Pan2 an1 xian4/*

páo /pao2/
1. (of an animal) to paw (the ground)
2. to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
3. gown (lined)
4. to dig; to excavate; (coll.) to exclude; not to count; to deduct; to subtract
5. to roar
6. kitchen
7. bottle gourd; Lagenaria vulgaris
8. to roast
9. Siberian roe deer (Capreolus pygargus)
10. to work hides; leather bag
11. (archaic) a type of deer
páo /pao2/
páozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. (of an animal) to paw (the ground)
2. to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
3. gown (lined)
4. to dig; to excavate; (coll.) to exclude; not to count; to deduct; to subtract
5. to roar
6. kitchen
7. bottle gourd; Lagenaria vulgaris
8. to roast
9. Siberian roe deer (Capreolus pygargus)
10. to work hides; leather bag
11. (archaic) a type of deer
páo /pao2/
páoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

2. to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
3. gown (lined)
4. to dig; to excavate; (coll.) to exclude; not to count; to deduct; to subtract
5. to roar
6. kitchen
7. bottle gourd; Lagenaria vulgaris
8. to roast
9. Siberian roe deer (Capreolus pygargus)
10. to work hides; leather bag
11. (archaic) a type of deer
páo /pao2/

6. kitchen
7. bottle gourd; Lagenaria vulgaris

pài /pai4/
1. (literary) tributary; branch of a river
2. clique; school; group; faction
3. (bound form) style; manner
4. to send (a person or resource); to dispatch; to allocate (a resource or task); to appoint (sb)
5. classifier for factions, groups etc
6. (preceded by »yī«) classifier used in characterizing a scene, atmosphere, demeanor, sound, remark etc
7. (loanword) pi (Greek letter Π, π); the circular ratio 𝜋 = 3.14159...
8. (loanword) pie
9. pinane

pàn /pan4/
1. to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
2. (bound form) to differentiate; to distinguish
3. (bound form) clearly (different)
4. to judge; to decide; to grade
5. (of a judge) to sentence
6. to hope for; to long for; to expect
7. to betray; to rebel; to revolt
8. to strive for; to struggle; to disregard; to reject
9. (bound form) side; edge; boundary
10. (literary) to melt; to dissolve
11. button loop; sth similar to a button loop (shoe strap, basket handle etc); to tie together; to stitch together
12. pleasing; clever talk
13. (dialect) handle of a cup, kettle or other vessel
14. disperse

1. bubble; foam
2. blister
3. to soak; to steep; to infuse
4. to dawdle; to loiter
5. to pick up (a girl)
6. to get off with (a sexual partner)

8. classifier for number of infusions
9. cannon; CL: zuò
10. firecracker
11. pimple; acne; blister; boil; ulcer
12. ancient ballista for throwing heavy stones
13. pastry; cake

pén /pen2/
1. basin; flower pot; unit of volume equal to 12 »dǒu« and 8 »shēng«, approx 128 liters
2. flowing of water; name of a river
pénbō /pen2 bo1/*
■ generic term for pottery
péndǐ /pen2di3/
■ (anatomy) pelvic floor
péndì /pen2 di4/*
■ (geography) basin; depression
péng /peng2/
1. shed; canopy; shack
2. friend
3. fleabane (family Asteraceae); disheveled; classifier for luxuriant plants, smoke, ashes, campfires: clump, puff
4. sail
5. swollen
6. boron (chemistry)
7. target in archery
8. strong bow; bowstring; to fill; full
9. to ward off (in tai chi)
10. (literary) to whip; to flog
11. roar of dashing waves
12. menorrhagia
13. luxuriant growth
14. war chariot (archaic)
15. disheveled
péng /peng2/
péngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

2. friend
3. fleabane (family Asteraceae); disheveled; classifier for luxuriant plants, smoke, ashes, campfires: clump, puff
4. sail
5. swollen

péng /peng2/

2. friend
3. fleabane (family Asteraceae); disheveled; classifier for luxuriant plants, smoke, ashes, campfires: clump, puff
4. sail
5. swollen
6. boron (chemistry)
7. target in archery
8. strong bow; bowstring; to fill; full
9. to ward off (in tai chi)
10. (literary) to whip; to flog
11. roar of dashing waves
12. menorrhagia
13. luxuriant growth
14. war chariot (archaic)
15. disheveled
péng /peng2/
péngle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. shed; canopy; shack
2. friend
3. fleabane (family Asteraceae); disheveled; classifier for luxuriant plants, smoke, ashes, campfires: clump, puff
4. sail
5. swollen
6. boron (chemistry)
7. target in archery
8. strong bow; bowstring; to fill; full
9. to ward off (in tai chi)
10. (literary) to whip; to flog
11. roar of dashing waves
12. menorrhagia
13. luxuriant growth
14. war chariot (archaic)
15. disheveled

■ to conspire; to gang up
